item.description:
Oh come all ye faithful climbers to the city of Everett . Where we will congregate at the picnic tables at 7:00 then proceed to the holey walls of Metrorock for bouldering, toproping and lead climbing. After many glorious climbs thy cup shall floweth over with tasty eats and frosty beverages at TBD location.

Please note: you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can take a belay test when you get there. If you have never climbed before, you should take a class at Metrorock. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements to take the class. You can use the message board on this meetup to find other people that want to take the class. Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder.

Metrorock is hard to find for first time visitors. So if you find yourself going in circles here are some hints - From the traffic circle near Wellington Station take Santili Highway towards Best Buy and Mellon:
If Best Buy is on your right and the Mellon building is on your left as you are going away from the circle, you are on the correct road. Then, take a left when you see a sign that says MetroRock. This sign is very very easy to miss as it is quite dark at night. Also, the road is full of potholes so drive slowly. Then take the next left to MetroRock.
Or, see http://www.metrorock..... for directions.

The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car. Last shuttle back to the T is at 9:30 or so. But, if you want to stay until 10 and/or join us for post-climb food and beverages, rides will be arranged.
item.name: A good Friday for climbing
